summary: This mod adds a small tower home that can be acquired by the player. Centrally located in the town of Amber Creek, it is designed to blend in with Alexander J. Velicky\'s \'Falskaar\' seamlessly. This mod is not maintained or supported by Alexander J. Velicky in anyway.
descriptionHtml:
Mod Name: Whetherstone House
Mod Author: 132885
Version: 1.0
Release Date: 7/19/13
Category: Classes

===========
Description
===========

This mod adds a small tower home that can be acquired by the player. Centrally located in the town of Amber Creek, it is designed to blend in with Alexander J. Velicky\'s \'Falskaar\' seamlessly. This mod is not maintained or supported by Alexander J. Velicky in anyway.



========
Location
========

In Amber Creek, Falskaar. Right next to the market stands.



========
Details
========

This mod adds a small tower home that includes:
bedding for the player and one companion
fully operable windows
no loadscreens to get in or out
a small porched garden behind the tower
limited safe storage
full navmesh for followers
plus much more!



============
Installation
============

Extract Contents of the folder into C/Programfiles/steam/steamapps/skyrim/data



====================
Compatibility Issues
====================

There are no known compatibility issues.



===============
Licensing/Legal
===============

You are free to do whatever you want with this mod; however, I hold no responsibility for any damages caused.

Special thanks to Insanity for his window boxes!
